articles.title: BTS Member Profiles
articles.content: BTS (방탄소년단) consists of 7 members: RM (Leader), Jin, Suga, J-Hope, Jimin, V, and Jungkook. The group debuted on June 13, 2013, under Big Hit Entertainment.

articles.title: BLACKPINK Latest Comeback
articles.content: BLACKPINK's latest release features members Jisoo, Jennie, Rosé, and Lisa showcasing their signature sound with a blend of hip-hop and pop elements.

articles.title: NewJeans Breaking Records
articles.content: NewJeans, consisting of Minji, Hanni, Danielle, Haerin, and Hyein, continues to break streaming records with their unique take on K-pop.

social_media.content: BTS's 'Dynamite' becomes the most-streamed K-pop song on Spotify! Thank you ARMY for your incredible support! 💜 #BTS #방탄소년단
BLACKPINK 2024 WORLD TOUR [BORN PINK] Additional dates announced! See you soon BLINK! 🖤💗
NewJeans (뉴진스) 'Super Shy' Official MV hits 100M views! Thank you for your love and support! 🐰
